testPlans.title: Homepage Functionality and Accessibility
testPlans.description: Test homepage loads correctly with all key elements and meets accessibility standards
steps: Navigate to http://localhost:3000
Verify page loads within 3 seconds
Check that hero section is visible and properly formatted
Verify navigation menu is present and accessible
Confirm featured products are displayed with images and prices
Run accessibility check for WCAG AA compliance
Test responsive design on mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports

testPlans.title: Product Detail Page Functionality
testPlans.description: Test product pages display correctly and add to cart works
steps: Navigate to a product page from homepage
Verify product title, price, and description are displayed
Check that product images load correctly
Verify add to cart button is present and clickable
Click add to cart button
Verify cart icon updates with item count
Check for accessibility violations on product page

testPlans.title: Shopping Cart Functionality
testPlans.description: Test cart page displays items correctly and allows updates
steps: Navigate to /cart page
Verify cart items are displayed with images, titles, and prices
Test quantity increase and decrease buttons
Verify cart total updates when quantity changes
Test remove item functionality
Verify empty cart state displays when all items removed
Check checkout button is prominent and accessible
Test responsive layout on mobile devices

testPlans.title: Product Search
testPlans.description: Test search functionality returns relevant results
steps: Locate search input in header
Enter a search term (e.g., 'microscope')
Submit search form
Verify search results page loads
Check that results contain relevant products
Verify no results message displays for non-existent products
Test search input accessibility

testPlans.title: Product Collections
testPlans.description: Test collections page and collection detail pages
steps: Navigate to /collections
Verify collections are displayed
Click on a collection
Verify collection detail page loads with products
Check product filtering works if available
Verify mobile responsiveness
